tasks.task: Planting flowers and bulbs in a garden setting.
subtasks: Using tools to minimize physical strain during planting.
Staggering planting dates to extend growing season.
Planting larger quantities of bulbs and seedlings.

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Planting flowers and bulbs in a garden setting.
subtasks: Bending while planting individual flowers (e.g., pansies, ranunculus).
Kneeling frequently to work on the ground level, typical in flower bed planting.
Using tools (e.g., to reduce strain during planting, mentioned as a mitigating factor for physical labor).
Transferring and planting large quantities of seedlings (up to 35-40,000) and bulbs (5-6,000) requires handling many plants.
Staggering planting dates (over 8-10 weeks) to manage workload and maximize bench space.
